name: SPL1T
description:
SPL1T is easy to play and insanely additive.

Just remember, don’t hit the red dots! You can merge and split, make use of these two different status to avoid these red dots.

Absorb the blue dots to get a higher score.

Highlights:
• Really addictive quick-fix game
• Tap and hold to split the dots
• Release to merge into 1 dot
• Elegant design
• Save and share your progress on Game Center

The game offers in-app purchase to remove all ads.
